qaqc.premobilization.checklist.form qaqc.premobilization.checklist
QA/QC Premobilization Checklist (Onshore And Offshore)
Instructions: Verify Box to be ticked by Project lead/ Project Manager before QA/QC final inspection. Check Box to be ticked after inspection by QA/QC Rep. Equipment and Personnel list to be attached with checklist.
employee.requisition.form.form employee.requisition.form
Posting
EMPLOYEE REQUISITION FORM
The Recruitment Requisition Procedure detailed below must be completed prior to the commencement of any recruitment exercise.
a) Prior to the employment of any employee the Employee Requisition Form must be completed.
b). Requisition Form duly completed by Immediate Supervisor and approved by respective Department HOD will be submitted to HR Department. The HR Department then sources and concludes the recruitment as outlined in Topline’s Recruitment Procedure.

Receiving Inspection Report
Other Verification Parameters (tick boxes that are applicable)
Verify if product was manufactured by specified manufacturer/distributor and tested as required
Confirm that vendor is on the Topline approved list, if not, confirm reason(s) for usage
Verify that items incorporated noted instructions per purchase order
Confirm delivery time/date as specified in the request
Verify that item matches product description
Confirm that item quantity is correct

view.lifting.plan.form lifting.plan
1. SLING SELECTION
2. SHACKLE SELECTION
LIFTING CONDITION (FROM CHART)
MULTIPLE CRANE LIFTS REQUIRE A SEPARATE LIFT PLAN FOR EACH CRANE. ANY CHANGES IN THE CONFIGURATION OF THE CRANE, PLACEMENT, RIGGING, LIFTING SCHEME ETC OR CHANGES IN ANY CALCULATION REQUIRE THAT A NEW LIFT PLAN BE DEVELOPED.
